instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00875: What is 820-00875? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00875</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no pictures
threads.message:
Have a <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00875</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> board with out pictures on screen. any idea where to start? i have backlight. smc reset dosent fixit. 
no sign for water damage. i dont know any history except that the customer mean that screen working on extern screen.
